thread.title: Fan secures SECOND date with Eugenie Bouchard after winning Super Bowl bet | Metro News
thread.title_full: Fan secures SECOND date with Eugenie Bouchard after winning Super Bowl bet | Metro News

author: George Bellshaw For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Fan secures SECOND date with Eugenie Bouchard after winning Super Bowl bet | Metro News
text:
George Bellshaw for Metro.co.uk Thursday 16 Feb 2017 3:24 pm Bouchard will go on a second date with the NFL fanGetty Images) 
The lucky fan who secured a date with Eugenie Bouchard after winning a bet on Twitter has gone one further by managing to land a second night out with the tennis star. Man Utd 3-0 St-Etienne player ratings: Ibrahimovic hat-trick puts tie to bed 
John Goehrke wangled the first by challenging her prediction that the Atlanta Falcons would beat the New England Patriots in the Super Bowl, when the Falcons were 28-3 up. 
Bouchard agreed to go on a date with him should the Patriots secure an unlikely comeback and Tom Brady helped to secure the NFL fan a dream date with the 22-year-old Canadian. 
— Genie Bouchard (@geniebouchard) February 16, 2017 
The pair went out to watch the New York Mets against the Milwaukee Bucks and looked to enjoy themselves while sat courtside. 
And incredibly, they will now go out again, Bouchard confirmed. A post shared by Genie Bouchard (@geniebouchard) on Feb 15, 2017 at 6:42pm PST 
‘It has been awesome, he’s normal,’ the 2014 Wimbledon finalist told TMZ. 
‘I planned date. He picked me up at my hotel like a gentleman, then we came over here, he brought me a nice little gift and he enjoyed the game courtside. More
